text: Was there on a Saturday night. After checking out, my daughter put the items into a plastic bag. The staff (an older aunty), grabbed the plastic bag off my daughter's hands. Only after I told her and she realizing there were items in the plastic bag did she go off in a puff. Very unnecessary encounter and very rude. Daiso needs to retrain their staff at this outlet badly. Would have given a 1 star, had it not been for the items sold there which are quite nice and affordable. Staff need to watch their attitude, and not be condescending to kids just because they are kids. Daiso management needs to take notice.

We had great time over a cup of coffee & puff at Kopi & tarts.. And a take away of two box of üç£üç£sushi which is balanced with cut & crafted handrolled.
At Sushiro.
Must carry on makan.
It's daiso. Who doesn't love daiso? but since it's a Collab w threeppy some stuffs aint $2. Many varieties tho üëç
Always visit for $2 item, most purchased was their pocky. Pretty good with coffee or tea on a lazy noon.
Will not go, just another place where price is higher than daiso.......no longer buying anything daiso or 3ppy.
